mapper.select: select p.id, p.parent_id, p.permission_name, p.permission_key, p.sort, p.create_time, p.update_time from sys_permission p where exists (select 1 from sys_role_permission rp join sys_user_role ur on rp.role_id = ur.role_id where rp.permission_id = p.id and ur.user_id = #{userId}) order by p.sort, p.id
